name: davidcraigmyle/silverstripe-userforms-remove-all-enquiries
description: UserForms Remove All Enquiries enables CMS users to remove all enquiries within the UserForms module at one time.

suggest.colymba/gridfield-bulk-editing-tools: Allows for bulk management of form submissions
suggest.silverstripe/secureassets: Enables files uploaded via userforms to be secured from public access
suggest.silverstripe/gridfieldqueuedexport: Export large submission as CSV through queued jobs in the background
